H0.text: Motion is what Isaac Newton is best known for studying.

H1.text: Weather is the study for which Isaac Newton is best known.

H2.text: Body systems are what Isaac Newton is best known for studying.

H3.text: The history of Earth is what Isaac Newton is best known for studying.

A4.text: His book Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica (Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy), first published in 1687, achieved the first great unification in physics and established classical mechanics.

A5.text: In the Principia, Newton formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation that formed the dominant scientific viewpoint for centuries until it was superseded by the theory of relativity.
